title: Living tomorrow. No. 139
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Perpendicular architecture: a tent designed for mountaineers who spend their dormitory hours hanging from the vertical faces of mountains. Burns hoverbed: a new treatment for burns, a bed which supports the patient on air by the hover principle. Resins and foam: quick setting resins react with water to set hard; expanding foams fill potentially dangerous cracks in cable ducts, as part of a fire protection system for power stations.
